channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - haskell

item.title: Trying out Pelican, part one
item.description: One of the goals I've set myself to do this year (not as a new year resolution though, I *really* want to accomplish this ;-) is to move my blog from Wordpress to a statically built website. And Pelican looks to be a good solution to do so. It's based on â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
